Body: Edit: (Not a duplicate) This question is not related to another  question on the forum, this is related also to android 4.3 jelly bean,  and furthermore I have provided my serial number of Galaxy S4, so read  the question fully.I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 i9300XXUAMDK, and I still have 4.2.2 Jelly Bean. I don't understand why I am not even getting the 4.3 Jelly Bean update when 4.4 KitKat is rolling out for Samsung S4. Does someone have any clue?
Title: Galaxy S4 not receiving official update

history.Text: I have a Samsung `Galaxy S4 i9300XXUAMDK`, and I am still with the update `4.2.2 Jelly Bean`. I don't understand why I am not getting even the updates of the `Jelly Bean 4.3` when updates of `Kit Kat 4.4` are rolling out for Samsung S4. Does someone have any clue?
I cant official updates Galaxy S4
